generated_description: hako elektronik, legally known as hako elektronik sanayi ve ticaret limited, is a company specializing in providing technical services and consultancy for gas leak detection systems used by refrigeration and automotive manufacturers. initially a private company, it was rebranded as hako elektronik sanayi ve ticaret a.ş. in 2017. the company offers a comprehensive solution called the "hako shield" system, which ensures the smooth operation of gas leak detectors and provides a 24-48-hour failure resolution guarantee. hako elektronik serves the hvac-r sector globally, including turkey, with over 300 gas leak detectors. additionally, the company operates hakosoft software technologies a.ş., which develops software solutions and supports iot projects.
